title: A letter of several French ministers fled into Germany upon the account of the persecution in France to such of their brethren in England as approved the Kings declaration touching liberty of conscience : translated from the original in French.
author: Jurieu, Pierre, 1637-1713.
notes: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Attributed to Pierre Jurieu. cf. NUC pre-1956.
Translation of work by William Wake. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
